row.entry: The color contrast module provides simplified control for changing the contrast or separation of colors between either green/magenta or blue/yellow axis.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Higher values increase color contrast, lower values decrease it. The effect of this module's sliders are similar to applying a steepened or flattened a- or b-curve in module tone curve (see ).

sect5.title: green vs. magenta
sect5.para: Changes color contrast for green versus magenta.

sect5.title: blue vs. yellow
sect5.para: Changes color contrast for blue versus yellow.
